A company generates leads from a web form. Salespeople manage leads by country/region. All salespeople are part of the same Dynamics 365 Sales team.

The sales manager requires the following functionality:

• Automate lead assignments.
• Ensure even lead distribution among salespeople.

You create a country/region attribute for the process. You must simplify the process. You plan to use segments when possible.

You need to create a lead assignment rule for each country/region.

Which configurations should you use? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

comments.content: Round robin means evey salesperson gets to be assigned with a lead each and then continue with next round of lead assignment to each salesperson. The question says "even lead distribution amongst salespeople" so round robin is the correct answer. If it is to do with balancing workload, then it is load balancing, i.e., keep number of leads assigned per salesperson to be as close as possible.

discussion.content: Second question answer is C in my opinion, they talk about product quote in D, so can't be right.

Price calculation when price list is mandatory versus optional
Price calculations depend on whether a price list is mandatory while adding products or whether your organization has made price lists optional.

When price list is mandatory, price calculation won't happen if:

You haven't selected a price list on the opportunity, quote, order, or invoice records.

You've selected a price list on the opportunity, quote, order, or invoice record, but you're adding a product that doesn't belong to the selected price list.

You've selected a price list on the opportunity, quote, order, or invoice record, but:

The price list item for the product's default price list isn't present.

The currency of the product's default price list doesn't match the currency on the quote product, order product, or invoice product. https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/sales/price-calculation-opportunity-quote-order-invoice-records
